SafeReplace(String, String, String)

Replace value from the string with new one.

NOTE: If is Empty string the result will be the original string

If is Empty string the result will be the original string

SafeReplaceAll(String, String[], String)

Replaces all occurences of the old values with the provided new value

TupleSplit(String, String)

Splits the string into exactly two pieces using the provided separator. NOTE: If more or less then two pieces are the result of the split operation, exception is thrown.
